message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000 for it. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm not quite ready to accept your offer. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1080000. Can we meet in the middle from there?
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1065000. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting closer to a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $1065000, so I'll counter with $1072500. Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think we can do a bit better. I'll meet you halfway from $1072500, so I'll offer $1071250. Can you consider this counteroffer?
